snippet.title: Miner's Mettle Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Out-think and out-shoot your competitors in this artillery-based strategy game coming to Early Access on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1058800/Miners_Mettle/


Discord: https://discord.gg/XNdE37p
Website: https://www.minersmettle.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MinerMettle
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/minersmettle/



Set in the distant future, and on an isolated mining planet, you must control a fleet of artillery-trains. In battlefields kilometers long and wide, you will need a marksman's eye to disrupt and destroy your competitors. Return with precious resources and gain varied new technology to customize your units. Use your tech to extend your advantage against your competitors.
